arts.ttl: Kairat Almaty v Celtic, Champions League Playoff – Team News, match officials and where to watch
arts.sum: Financially speaking tonight is perhaps the biggest game in Celtic’s unbroken history with a prize of over £40million at risk should Celtic fail to defeat FC Kairat in the Ortalyk Stadion… Around 300 Celtic supporters have made the trip from all corners of the world to be at the game and that level of support Read More

arts.ttl: Celtic boost as Kairat Almaty striker ruled out of return leg
arts.sum: Kairat Almaty have been handed another injury setback before the second leg of their Champions League play-off with Celtic tonight.

arts.ttl: Who will win Kairat Almaty vs Celtic? Our writers deliver predictions for Champions League playoff second leg
arts.sum: It's a £40million shoot-out for the Hoops as they looked to return to the league phase promise land

arts.ttl: Is Kairat Almaty vs Celtic on TV? Live stream, channel and Champions League kick-off time
arts.sum: The stakes couldn't be higher as Brendan Rodgers' side head to Kazakhstan for the £40million winner-takes-all showdown
